Hi, I'm Sam - a 31-year-old mechanical engineer, entrepreneur, and maker based in Zurich. I studied at ETH Zurich, where I cultivated my passion for innovation and hands-on creation. I'm currently working on making beautiful and smart solar facades with Solskin. My interests span technology, entrepreneurship, and crafting everything from my own furniture to everyday gadgets. Welcome to my space, where I share my projects, insights, and inspirations.
